metadata.description: {\rtf1\ansi\deff0\nouicompat{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset238 Arial;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset0 Courier New;}} {\*\generator Riched20 10.0.19041}\viewkind4\uc1 \pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\fs22\lang5 This script lists all used Reaper plugins, grouping them into categories. It generates output in a markdown-compatible format.\par The motivation comes from KVR OSC (KVRaudio One Synth Challange) competition, which requires providing such statistics (though, it doesn't require markdown format)\par \f1\lang1029 An example of the raw output:\f2\lang5\par \fs16 **Instruments:**\line |Plugin Name |Quantity |\line |---------------------------|----------|\line |VST3i: Wavetable (SocaLabs)|31 |\line\line **Effects:**\line |Plugin Name |Quantity |\line |----------------------------------------------|----------|\line |JS: ReEQ - Parametric Graphic Equalizer |19 |\line |VST3: ValhallaSupermassive (Valhalla DSP, LLC)|11 |\line |VST: FerricTDSmkII (Variety Of Sound) |1 |\line |VST: OrilRiver (Denis Tihanov) |1 |\line |VST: ReaComp (Cockos) |5 |\line |VST: ReaDelay (Cockos) |2 |\line |VST: ReaLimit (Cockos) |4 |\line\line **Monitoring plugins:**\line |Plugin Name |Quantity |\line |-----------------------------------------------|----------|\line |JS: Goniometer |1 |\line |JS: Oscilloscope Meter (Cockos) |1 |\line |JS: ReSpectrum |1 |\line |VST3: Youlean Loudness Meter 2 (Youlean) (10ch)|1 |\line |VST: SPAN (Voxengo) (8ch) |1 |\line\line **Offline/inactive plugins:**\line |Plugin Name |Quantity |\line |---------------------------------|----------|\line |VST3i: Stochas (Surge Synth Team)|4 |\line |VST: ReaComp (Cockos) |1 |\line |VST: ReaLimit (Cockos) |1 |\par }

version.author: Michal MaXyM Bartak
version.changelog: Added GUI and options to copy result to clipboard in various formats
